about.description: Full Stack Developer focused on Next.js, React, TypeScript and React Native. I have experience creating RESTful APIs using Node.js, Express and MySQL. I like to understand how things work behind the scenes and I tend to learn a lot while getting hands-on. I enjoy working with technology because there's always something new to discover and test. I study Software Engineering at FAMETRO – Faculdade Metropolitana de Manaus.
about.name: Felipe Martins de Souza

skills.title: How I can help with my

web.title: Web Development
web.content: I build modern, responsive and SEO-optimized interfaces, ensuring performance, accessibility and a great user experience. I integrate APIs, adapt designs to various devices and apply front-end best practices.

backend.title: Backend & APIs
backend.content: I develop secure and efficient APIs with authentication and database integration. I structure routes, business logic and scalable architecture using best practices.

mobile.title: Mobile Development
mobile.content: I build functional and responsive mobile apps with React Native and API integration. Focused on performance, usability and cross-platform compatibility.

design.title: UI/UX Design
design.content: I plan and develop interfaces focused on user experience. I use intuitive design principles, information architecture and rapid prototyping to deliver functional and aesthetically appealing solutions.
